mapper.select:
SELECT CEC.id, CEC.lastUpdateDate, CEC.lastUpdateUserId, CEC.name, CEC.type, CEC.vcid, CEC.topicId, CEC.topicType, CEC.createDate, CEC.createUserId, CEC.parentId, CEC.remark FROM CAL_EVENT_CATALOG CEC WHERE
AND CEC.id = #{id}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO CAL_EVENT_CATALOG ( id, lastUpdateDate, lastUpdateUserId, name, type, vcid, topicId, topicType, createDate, createUserId, parentId, remark ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{lastUpdateDate}, #{lastUpdateUserId}, #{name}, #{type}, #{vcid}, #{topicId}, #{topicType}, #{createDate}, #{createUserId}, #{parentId}, #{remark} )
mapper.delete:
DELETE FROM CAL_EVENT_CATALOG WHERE
AND id = #{id}
mapper.update:
UPDATE CAL_EVENT_CATALOG
lastUpdateDate = #{lastUpdateDate,javaType=java.util.Date},
lastUpdateUserId = #{lastUpdateUserId,javaType=java.lang.String},
name = #{name,javaType=java.lang.String},
type = #{type,javaType=com.tx.local.calendar.model.CalendarEventTypeEnum},
vcid = #{vcid,javaType=java.lang.String},
topicId = #{topicId,javaType=java.lang.String},
topicType = #{topicType,javaType=com.tx.local.calendar.model.CalendarEventTopicTypeEnum},
parentId = #{parentId,javaType=java.lang.String},
remark = #{remark,javaType=java.lang.String},
WHERE
AND id = #{id}
